title: Scotch bonnet chilli jam
ingredients: ['100g Scotch bonnet chilli peppers (preferably red), seeds removed', '6 large red peppers, seeds and veins removed', '2 large onions', '4 cloves garlic', '5cm (2 in) fresh root ginger, grated', '350ml cider vinegar', '1kg granulated sugar or light muscovado sugar (preferred)']
